message: Based on my personal Experience my Ex company GCSSD Hacked my Facebook account after posting a blog about them and Not paying my salary, Please report my old account has been hacked and share this post between your friends
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: GCS/GCSSD Egypt Hack People Accounts
caption: egypt-webdesign.com
description: GCS/GCSSD Egypt Hack People Accounts After posting my last post (GCSSD Egypt/GCS Company Review & Why you shouldn’t work in GCS) to review the company and to tell the story that GCSSD Egypt didn’t pay my salary and instead of GCSSD Egypt look into my issue and resolve it.
